General.Name: Palred Technologies Limited
General.Description: Palred Technologies Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the e-commerce business in India. The company offers Bluetooth and wired headsets, wearables, Bluetooth speakers and sound bars, mobile accessories, cables and chargers, computer accessories, cameras and camera accessories, power banks etc. under pTron and Xmate brand names. It also owns and operates ecommerce websites, including ptron.in and LatestOne.com that sells tech and mobile accessories such as Bluetooth speakers and headsets, cables, power banks, smart watches, fashion accessories, etc. The company was formerly known as Four Soft Technologies Limited and changed its name to Palred Technologies Limited in January 2014. Palred Technologies Limited was incorporated in 1999 and is based in Hyderabad, India.
